meta_title: What Is a SKU? Definition and Industrial SKU Architecture
meta_description: Understand the meaning of SKUs in industrial maintenance and MRO. Learn how SKU architecture optimizes inventory turnover and asset lifecycle management systems.
title: What is a SKU (Stock Keeping Unit)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is a SKU (Stock Keeping Unit)?

image_prompt: A high-angle, photo-realistic shot of a modern industrial warehouse aisle. A maintenance professional in a high-visibility vest and hardhat is using a rugged tablet to scan a QR code on a neatly labeled bin. The background shows organized shelves of mechanical components like gears and motors, with soft industrial lighting and a clean, high-tech facility atmosphere. No text visible on labels or screens.
